name: BitBox
description:
BitBox is a game prototype demonstrating a game mechanic in which the game's resolution is tied to the player's heath. Once the player's health drops low enough, the resolution will drop from 64x64 to 32x32 (the resolution will be 8x8 by the time the player dies).

Also, the player's health decreases over time, and must be replenished by collecting coins. This, combined with the dynamic resolution, creates an element of challenge and brings a sense of panic as the player's vision deteriorates.
